#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n,i;
		cin>>n;
		
		long long int a[n],b[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			
		
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			b[i]=a[i];
			
		
		}
		
		
		sort(a,a+n);
		//cout<<a[n-1]<<endl;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[n-1]==b[i])
			break;
		}
		//cout<<b[i]<<endl;
		long long int j = i+1;
		cout<<j<<endl;
	}
}
